Package dev.simplix.cirrus.common.mojangson

Class MojangsonWriter

java.lang.Object
com.google.gson.stream.JsonWriter
dev.simplix.cirrus.common.mojangson.MojangsonWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, Flushable, AutoCloseable
public class MojangsonWriter extends com.google.gson.stream.JsonWriter
A modified version of JsonWriter only using quotes when it is necessary. MojangsonWriter is lenient by default.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MojangsonWriter(Writer out)
    Creates a new instance that writes a MOJANGSON-encoded stream to out.

  • Constructor Details

    • MojangsonWriter

      public MojangsonWriter(Writer out)
      Creates a new instance that writes a MOJANGSON-encoded stream to out. For best performance, ensure Writer is buffered; wrapping in BufferedWriter if necessary.
